review: Pretty Amazingly good game, doesnt go boring :D it also balance out the features of offence defence. It is required to repair and really good game in general
its very entertaining for hundreds of hours especially with friends

ERIC CARTMAN IS BACK WITH A HILARIOUS GAME 8.3/10  The gameplay and storyline was amazing just like the tv show but the fighting was not very good. Sometimes it would take people 5 minutes to take down a bossi wish the developers reconsider on how to improve their next title :D
